title: Unable to login via Google
description: Users report that Google login returns a 500 error during callback. Happens intermittently.

title: Dashboard cards overlap
description: On devices 420px, dashboard cards overlap when charts render. Needs responsive fixes.

title: Password reset email not delivered
description: Some users do not receive password reset emails; SMTP logs show timeouts for certain domains.

title: File upload fails for files
description: Attachments larger than 5MB return 413 Payload Too Large from server. Need server config update.

title: Add CSV export for filtered tickets
description: Users request ability to export current filters as CSV with selectable columns.

title: Performance: slow ticket list on high pages
description: API response time > 2s when fetching page > 8. Suspect missing DB index in queries.

title: Improve empty state with CTA
description: Design an attractive empty state with illustration and a Create Ticket CTA for new users.

title: Document API v2 migration notes
description: Write changelog entry and migration guidance for customers upgrading to API v2.

title: Audit login attempts and lockout policy
description: Implement account lockout after 5 failed attempts and store audit logs for security review.

title: UI: Add priority color labels
description: Show colored priority badges in ticket list and detail view to improve scanning.
